content:
If you feel not savvy enough to use the update, then it's unlikely to be a good experience attempting the steps to go back to the old version.

You can make the update look more like the old version, just like you can make the update look even newer than the default you are seeing.

There really isn't anything in the new interface that should be unfamiliar. What is it exactly that has you stumped?
creator: wsmwk
